text: The Nutty Professor is a 1996 American science fiction romantic comedy movie. It was released by Imagine Entertainment/Paramount Pictures. It stars Eddie Murphy and co-stars Jada Pinkett Smith, John Ales, James Coburn, Larry Miller, Dave Chappelle and Montell Jordan. Eddie Murphy plays university professor Sherman Klump, Jada Pinkett Smith plays a chemistry graduate student, John Ales plays Shermanâ€™s assistant Jason, James Coburn plays Harlan Hartley, Larry Miller plays Dean Richmond, Dave Chappelle plays Reggie Warrington and Montell Jordan plays himself. It was marketed as a family science fiction comedy and earned $273,961,019. It had one sequel named Nutty Professor II: The Klumps which was released in theaters and later given a format release. There is also a third movie in development which was set to be released mid-late 2011. == Other websites == * Category:1996 romantic comedy movies Category:1996 science fiction movies Category:African-American movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Mad scientist movies Category:Movies composed by David Newman Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Nutty Professor (1996 movie)
